casebody.data:
MRS. MARGIE MEREDITH, widow, for herself and her children and FLORIDA INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION, v. CITY CAB COMPANY, INC., and AMERICAN FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY. 14 So. (2nd) 719

June Term, 1943

July 24, 1943 Special Division A H. N. Roth, for appellants. Maguire, Voorhis & Wells, R. F. Maguire and W. H. Foe, for appellees. PER CURIAM:

The record in this case having been duly considered and finding no reversible error the judgment is affirmed.

BUFORD, C. J., CHAPMAN, ADAMS and THOMAS, JJ., concur.
